thread.title: atSnap 1.1 for iOS Adds Fun Bling to Travel Photos
thread.title_full: atSnap 1.1 for iOS Adds Fun Bling to Travel Photos

title: atSnap 1.1 for iOS Adds Fun Bling to Travel Photos
text: atSnap 1.1 for iOS Adds Fun Bling to Travel Photos October 16, 2015 in Travel [prMac.com] Shepparton, Australia - Neon Room is proud to announce the release of atSnap 1.1, an important update to their travel photography app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch devices. atSnap brings the traditional travel stamp into the modern age. Users can apply a number of fun and informative stamps to their photos. Anyone can add stamps, including badges based on the location the photo was taken, the country's flag, fun emoji-style graphics, and more, to any photo with atSnap. Users can even add a personal message or fun emoji style graphics to the photo. Personal messages are easily added to photos via the app's built-in text template stamps. atSnap stamp options include: Countries, Points of Interest, Text, Collections (including fun emoji, warning signs, holiday & event badges, romantic badges, and more), and even weather-related stamps. All travel stamps and badges can be positioned anywhere on the photos, users can even overlap them if they'd like. Users can also discover hidden badges and stamps as they travel, as Neon Room has "hidden" exclusive points of interest and city badges around the globe for users to find. atSnap users never know when a custom badge might show up on their photos! In addition to having the option to add stamps, flags, and messages to photos, atSnappers can also share the finished product via their Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter accounts, or they can go "old school," and email the finished product directly."While travel photos are always fun to take and share, we thought adding a special touch like travel stamps, emoji, city & points of interest badges, and personal messages to the photos made sharing them with friends and family even more special," says Neon Room owner James Kyriakou. "I'm especially pleased with the idea we had about adding hidden badges around the globe. Our users never know when a surprise badge might be available to use on their photos, making the finished photos even more unique!" Features: * Apply travel stamps to photos, based on the location they were taken * Users can also apply atSnap's fun badges and stamps to any photo on their iOS device's Camera Roll * Add fun emoji-type stamps, weather badges, holiday and event themes, and more * Add personal messages via the built-in text template stamps * Share atSnap photos via social networks, or via email * Surprise points of interest and city badges add to the fun * Travel fans can share their adventures with friends and family back home * Version 1.1 improves text quality, and offers an iPhone 6 and iPad layout While atSnap was originally created for travelers, Neon Room is also offering a great new feature just for business owners. Interested businesses can now have their logo and location information saved on the atSnap server, for inclusion in the atSnap app. This allows users to add the company's branded logo to their photos before sharing them with everyone via social media. atSnap's Geo Stamps, Stickers and Badges feature helps businesses increase their social reach and brand awareness. While the feature is currently in beta, interested businesses can contact Neon Room for a quote or more information. Device Requirements: * iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch * Requires iOS 7.0 or later * Universal App * 24.5 MB Pricing and Availability: atSnap 1.1 is free, and is available worldwide exclusively through the App Store in the Travel category. A handy in-app purchase is available that allows users to remove the atSnap watermark from photos they save and share. Businesses who wish to learn more about atSnap's Geo Stamps, Stickers and Badges feature should contact James Kyriakou.
